"The publishing work that has been carried on in Battle Creek should, for the present, be carried on near Washington." * * * "Above all places, this place should now be worked. Satan is working there against Jehovah with all his might. I present this to you as a matter that is stirring me mightily. One thing is certain: we shall not be clear unless we at once do something in Washington to represent our work. I shall not be able to rest until I see the truth going forth as a lamp that burneth." 
                                                                           12
